name: Wort Homebrew Calculator
description: This homebrew application will help you through your whole brewing process, from recipe creation to helping you on your brew day. Create Recipes, Calculate OG, Gravity correction calculations to hit your preboil numbers, bottle priming calculations, keg carbonation calculators, Strike water calculators, SRM, IBU, Efficiency, ABV, and brix final gravity calculators. Please Remember, this application is still beta, If you have any issues, please email the developer and report any force closes. We will work to fix your issue ASAP.  If the application is missing any features that you would like, email the developer and we will try to have it added to the project. Your Recipes can now be saved to the cloud, so you can save your recipes on one device and have them waiting for you on any of your other devices! To enable this feature, please log into the app using either your email address, Google, or Facebook. Your data is backed up on our servers and then backed up remotely for even more piece of mind.  If you would like to support the development of the app, consider installing the PRO version   To keep up to date on whats happening with the Wort Application:  * Check out the Wort Community on Google+ * Follow @worthomebrew on Twitter * Follow Wort Homebrew Calculator on Facebook!  https://www.facebook.com/Wort-Homebrew-Calculator-1365080196884557/ I look forward to hearing your feedback!  Enjoy!
